host: [Required] The IP address used to connect to the target device
username: [Required] The Cisco SSH username used to log into the target device
password: [Required] The SSH password used to log into the target device
device_type: [Required] The device type used to configure communication for the target device
secret: [Optional] Secret password used to enable privileged mode on the target device
device_file: [Optional] JSON formatted file containing connection information for multiple devices

tftp_server: [Required] Enable this option to use a Trivial-FTP server to transfer the TCL payload scripts
tftp_server_ip: [Required] The IP address of the Trivial-FTP server
ftp_server: [Optional] Enable this option to use a FTP server to transfer the TCL payload scripts
ftp_server_ip: [Optional] The IP address of the FTP server
ftp_server_port: [Optional] The port number of the FTP server

ping_scan: [Optional] Enable to scan each network discovered using the ICMP protocol
port_scan: [Optional] Enable this option to automatically port scan hosts when discovered
port_list: [Optional] A comma separated list of ports to scan for... i.e. (80,135-139,443,445)

socks_proxy: [Optional] Enable to setup a SOCKS4 proxy on the target device (random port used unless specified)
socks_port: [Optional] The port to open on the router to use the proxy server
